bio.para: The Syrkov family have always been canny traders. They have kept up with trends and got in early and out before interest waned. As result they hav built up quite some resources (and rivals).

deity.name: Abadar
deity.description: God of cities, wealth, merchants, law
deity.domainlist: Defense Subdomain, Earth, Inevitable Subdomain, Law, Leadership Subdomain, Martyr Subdomain, Metal Subdomain, Nobility, Protection, Trade Subdomain, Travel
deity.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.91

feat.name: Power Attack
feat.description: You can make exceptionally deadly melee attacks by sacrificing accuracy for strength.

feat.name: Reward of Grace
feat.description: When you lay on hands, divine energy ripples through you, granting you grace.

feat.name: Skill Focus (Diplomacy)
feat.description: You are particularly adept at your chosen skill.

feat.name: Weapon Focus (Heavy Flail)
feat.description: You are especially good at using your chosen weapon.

ability_object.name: Bonus Energy Resistance (2x)
ability_object.description: Add +1 to the paladin's energy resistance to one kind of energy (maximum +10).

ability_object.name: Celestial Spirit
ability_object.description: Your divine bond allows you to enhance your weapon as a standard action by calling upon the aid of a celestial spirit for 6 minutes. When called, the spirit causes the weapon to shed light as a torch. This spirit grants the weapon a +1 enhancement bonus. This bonus can be added to the weapon, stacking with existing weapon bonuses to a maximum of +5, or it can be used to add any of the following weapon properties: defending, flaming, keen, merciful (+1), axiomatic, disruption, flaming burst, holy (+2), speed (+3), and brilliant energy (+4). Adding these properties consumes an amount of bonus equal to the property's cost. These bonuses are added to any properties the weapon already has, but duplicate abilities do not stack. If the weapon is not magical, at least a +1 enhancement bonus must be added before any other properties can be added. The bonus and properties granted by the spirit are determined when the spirit is called and cannot be changed until the spirit is called again. The celestial spirit imparts no bonuses if the weapon is held by anyone other than you but resumes giving bonuses if returned to you. These bonuses apply to only one end of a double weapon. You can use this ability 1 times per day. If a weapon bonded with a celestial spirit is destroyed, you lose the use of this ability for 30 days, or until you gain a level, whichever comes first. During this 30-day period, you take a -1 penalty on attack and weapon damage rolls.

ability_object.name: Chance Savior
ability_object.description: Fate smiled on you and Professor Lorrimor one day in the not so distant past. Through a matter of pure chance, you were in a position to save the late scholar's life and did so. His gratitude was effusive, and he promised that he would never forget you. You are unsure of the nature of the summons in his will, but believe he may have listed you as a possible heir in thanks for saving him from an untimely demise. Your ability to think quickly on your feet has stayed with you, and you quite often feel that you're in the right place at the right time. You gain a +2 trait bonus on Initiative checks.

ability_object.name: Rich Parents
ability_object.description: You were born into a rich family, perhaps even the nobility. Your starting cash increases to 900 gp.

ability_object.name: Mercy (Sickened)
ability_object.description: Whenever you use Lay on Hands to heal damage to one target, the target is no longer sickened.

ability_object.name: Mercy (Staggered)
ability_object.description: Whenever you use Lay on Hands to heal damage to one target, the target is no longer staggered, unless it is at exactly 0 hit points.

ability_object.name: Aura of Courage
ability_object.description: You are immune to fear (magical or otherwise). Each ally within 10 feet of you gains a +4 morale bonus on saving throws against fear effects. This ability functions only while you are conscious, not if you are unconscious or dead.

ability_object.name: Aura of Good
ability_object.description: You project a strong good aura.

ability_object.name: Bonus Feat
ability_object.description: Humans select one extra feat at 1st level.

ability_object.name: Channel Positive Energy
ability_object.description: You can unleash a wave of positive energy dealing 3d6 (DC 15 for half) /day. You can unleash a wave of positive energy. You must choose to deal 3d6 points of positive energy damage to undead creatures or to heal living creatures of 3d6 points of damage. Creatures that take damage from channeled energy receive a DC 15 Will save to halve the damage. Using this ability consumes two uses of her lay on hands ability.

ability_object.name: Detect Evil
ability_object.description: At will, you can use Detect Evil, as the Spell. You can, as a move action, concentrate on a single individual or item within 60 feet and determine if it is evil, learning the strength of its aura as if having studied it for 3 rounds. While focusing on one individual or object, you do not detect evil in any other object or individual within range.

ability_object.name: Divine Health
ability_object.description: You are immune to all diseases, including supernatural and magical diseases, including mummy rot.

ability_object.name: Lay on Hands
ability_object.description: You can heal wounds (your own or those of others) by touch. Each day you can use this ability 5 times per day. With one use of this ability, you can heal 3d6 hit points of damage. Using this ability is a standard action, unless you target yourself, in which case it is a swift action. Despite the name of this ability, you only need one free hand to use this ability. Alternatively, you can use this healing power to deal damage to undead creatures, dealing 3d6 points of damage. Using Lay on Hands in this way requires a melee touch attack and doesn't provide an attack of opportunity. Undead do not receive a saving throw against this damage.

ability_object.name: Skilled
ability_object.description: Humans gain an additional skill rank at 1st level and one additional rank whenever they gain a level.

ability_object.name: Smite Evil
ability_object.description: You can call out to the powers of good to aid you in your struggle against evil 2 times per day. As a swift action, you choose one target within sight to smite. If this target is evil, you add +2 to your attack rolls and +6 to all damage rolls made against the target of your smite. If the target of Smite Evil is an outsider with the evil subtype, an evil-aligned dragon, or an undead creature, the bonus to damage on the first successful attack increases to +12. Regardless of the target, Smite Evil attacks automatically bypass any DR the creature might possess. In addition, while smite evil is in effect, you gain a +2 deflection bonus to your AC against attacks made by the target of the smite. If you target a creature that is not evil, the smite is wasted with no effect. The Smite Evil effect remains until the target of the smite is dead or the next time you rest and regain your uses of this ability.

ability_object.name: Bonus Skill Rank (Diplomacy, Diplomacy, Diplomacy, Diplomacy)
+2 to One Ability Score
ability_object.description: Human characters get a +2 bonus to one ability score of their choice at creation to represent their varied nature.
ability_object.type: RACIALTRAITS.HUMAN RACIAL TRAIT.HUMAN RACIAL DEFAULT.SPECIALQUALITY.RACIAL ABILITY SCORES

ability_object.name: Languages
ability_object.description: Humans begin play speaking Common. Humans with high Intelligence scores can choose any languages they want (except secret languages, such as Druidic).
ability_object.type: RACIALTRAITS.HUMAN RACIAL TRAIT.HUMAN RACIAL DEFAULT.SPECIALQUALITY.RACIAL LANGUAGE

ability_object.name: Medium
ability_object.description: Humans are Medium creatures and have no bonuses or penalties due to their size.
ability_object.type: RACIALTRAITS.HUMAN RACIAL TRAIT.HUMAN RACIAL DEFAULT.SPECIALQUALITY.RACIAL SIZE

ability_object.name: Normal Speed
ability_object.description: Humans have a base speed of 30 feet.
ability_object.type: RACIALTRAITS.HUMAN RACIAL TRAIT.HUMAN RACIAL DEFAULT.SPECIALQUALITY.RACIAL SPEED

ability_object.name: Weapon and Armor Proficiency
ability_object.description: Paladins are proficient with all simple and martial weapons, with all types of armor (heavy, medium, and light), and with shields (except tower shields).

character.weapon_proficiencies: Amentum, Atlatl, Throwing Axe, Bardiche, Battleaxe, Bayonet, Bec de Corbin, Bill, Blowgun, Nine Ring Broadsword, Butterfly Sword, Cestus, Chakram, Club, Heavy Crossbow, Light Crossbow, Dagger, Punching Dagger, Dart, Double Chicken Saber, Falchion, Light Flail, Heavy Flail, Gauntlet, Spiked Gauntlet, Glaive, Glaive-Guisarme, Grapple, Greataxe, Greatclub, Greatsword, Guisarme, Halberd, Light Hammer, Handaxe, Hooked Lance, Iron Brush, Javelin, Jutte, Katana, Kerambit, Kukri, Lance, Longbow, Longspear, Longsword, Lucerne Hammer, Lungchuan Tamo, Heavy Mace, Light Mace, Mattock, Mere Club, Monk's Spade, Morningstar, Naginata, Nodachi, Heavy Pick, Light Pick, Pilum, Poisoned Sand Tube, Quarterstaff, Ranseur, Rapier, Rhomphaia, Rock, Sansetsukon, Sap, Scimitar, Scizore, Scythe, Shang Gou, Shieldbash, Shortbow, Shortspear, Sibat, Sickle, Sling, Spear, Boar Spear, Ray Spells, Touch Spells, Spiked Armor, Splash Weapon, Stake, Starknife, Bastard Sword, Short Sword, Tri-Point Double-Edged Sword, Sword Cane, Tepoztopilli, Terbutje, Tiger Fork, Tonfa, Trident, Tube Arrow Shooter, Unarmed Strike, Dwarven Waraxe, Warhammer, Wushu Dart

spell.name: Detect Evil
spell.effect: You can sense the presence of evil.
spell.description: You can sense the presence of evil.

spell.name: Bless
spell.effect: Bless fills your allies with courage.
spell.target: The caster and all allies within a 50-ft. burst, centered on the caster
spell.description: Bless fills your allies with courage.

spell.name: Bless Water
spell.effect: This transmutation imbues a flask of water with positive energy, turning it into holy water.
spell.description: This transmutation imbues a flask of water with positive energy, turning it into holy water.

spell.name: Bless Weapon
spell.effect: This transmutation makes a weapon strike true against evil foes.
spell.description: This transmutation makes a weapon strike true against evil foes.

spell.name: Bowstaff
spell.effect: A shortbow may double as a club, or a longbow as a quarterstaff.
spell.description: A shortbow may double as a club, or a longbow as a quarterstaff.

spell.name: Challenge Evil
spell.effect: Sickens creature if it refuses to fight you.

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.210

spell.description: Sickens creature if it refuses to fight you.

spell.name: Compel Hostility
spell.effect: Compels opponents to attack you instead of your allies.
spell.description: Compels opponents to attack you instead of your allies.

spell.name: Create Water
spell.effect: This spell generates wholesome, drinkable water, just like clean rain water.
spell.description: This spell generates wholesome, drinkable water, just like clean rain water.

spell.name: Cure Light Wounds
spell.effect: When laying your hand upon a living creature, you channel positive energy that cures 1d8+3 points of damage.
spell.description: When laying your hand upon a living creature, you channel positive energy that cures 1d8+(min(5,CASTERLEVEL)) points of damage.

spell.name: Detect Poison
spell.effect: You determine whether a creature, object, or area has been poisoned or is poisonous.
spell.target: Or Area one creature, one object, or a 5-ft. cube
spell.description: You determine whether a creature, object, or area has been poisoned or is poisonous.

spell.name: Detect Undead
spell.effect: You can detect the aura that surrounds undead creatures.
spell.description: You can detect the aura that surrounds undead creatures.

spell.name: Diagnose Disease
spell.effect: Detect and identify diseases.
spell.target: One creature, one object, or a 5-ft. cube
spell.description: Detect and identify diseases.

spell.name: Divine Favor
spell.effect: Calling upon the strength and wisdom of a deity, you gain a +1 luck bonus on attack and weapon damage rolls.
spell.description: Calling upon the strength and wisdom of a deity, you gain a +(max(1,min(3,floor(CASTERLEVEL/3)))) luck bonus on attack and weapon damage rolls.

spell.name: Endure Elements
spell.effect: A creature protected by endure elements suffers no harm from being in a hot or cold environment.
spell.description: A creature protected by endure elements suffers no harm from being in a hot or cold environment.

spell.name: Ghostbane Dirge
spell.effect: Incorporeal creature takes half damage from nonmagical weapons.

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.225

spell.description: Incorporeal creature takes half damage from nonmagical weapons.

spell.name: Grace
spell.effect: Movement doesn't provoke attacks of opportunity.

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.226

spell.description: Movement doesn't provoke attacks of opportunity.

spell.name: Hero's Defiance
spell.effect: Allows the use of lay on hands while falling unconscious.

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.226

spell.description: Allows the use of lay on hands while falling unconscious.

spell.name: Honeyed Tongue
spell.effect: Roll 2 dice when using Diplomacy, take higher roll.

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.228

spell.description: Roll 2 dice when using Diplomacy, take higher roll.

spell.name: Horn of Pursuit
spell.effect: Create three notes heard miles away.
spell.description: Create three notes heard miles away.

spell.name: Knight's Calling
spell.effect: Forces target to move toward you and fight you.

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.230

spell.description: Forces target to move toward you and fight you.

spell.name: Know the Enemy
spell.effect: Gain +10 on a monster Knowledge check.
spell.description: Gain +10 on a monster Knowledge check.

spell.name: Liberating Command
spell.effect: Target makes an Escape Artist check as an immediate action and gains a bonus on it.
spell.description: Target makes an Escape Artist check as an immediate action and gains a bonus on it.

spell.name: Litany of Sloth
spell.effect: Single target cannot make attacks of opportunity for 1 round.
spell.description: Single target cannot make attacks of opportunity for 1 round.

spell.name: Longshot
spell.effect: Grants a +10 foot bonus to the range increment for any ranged weapon fired.
spell.description: Grants a +10 foot bonus to the range increment for any ranged weapon fired.

spell.name: Magic Weapon
spell.effect: Magic weapon gives a weapon a +1 enhancement bonus on attack and damage rolls.
spell.description: Magic weapon gives a weapon a +1 enhancement bonus on attack and damage rolls.

spell.name: Protection from Chaos
spell.effect: This spell wards a creature from attacks by chaotic creatures, from mental control, and from summoned creatures.
spell.description: This spell wards a creature from attacks by chaotic creatures, from mental control, and from summoned creatures.

spell.name: Protection from Evil
spell.effect: This spell wards a creature from attacks by evil creatures, from mental control, and from summoned creatures.
spell.description: This spell wards a creature from attacks by evil creatures, from mental control, and from summoned creatures.

spell.name: Rally Point
spell.effect: Square gives good creatures bonuses.

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.237

spell.description: Square gives good creatures bonuses.

spell.name: Read Magic
spell.effect: You can decipher magical inscriptions on objects--books, scrolls, weapons, and the like--that would otherwise be unintelligible.
spell.description: You can decipher magical inscriptions on objects--books, scrolls, weapons, and the like--that would otherwise be unintelligible.

spell.name: Resistance
spell.effect: You imbue the subject with magical energy that protects it from harm, granting it a +1 resistance bonus on saves.
spell.description: You imbue the subject with magical energy that protects it from harm, granting it a +1 resistance bonus on saves.

spell.name: Restoration (Lesser)
spell.effect: Lesser restoration dispels any magical effects reducing one of the subject's ability scores or cures 1d4 points of temporary ability damage to one of the subject's ability scores.
spell.description: Lesser restoration dispels any magical effects reducing one of the subject's ability scores or cures 1d4 points of temporary ability damage to one of the subject's ability scores.

spell.name: Sanctify Corpse
spell.effect: Prevent a corpse from becoming an undead creature.
spell.description: Prevent a corpse from becoming an undead creature.

spell.name: Sun Metal
spell.effect: Weapon touched bursts into flames.
spell.description: Weapon touched bursts into flames.

spell.name: Tactical Acumen
spell.effect: You gain an additional +1 on attack rolls or to AC due to battlefield positioning.
spell.target: The caster and all allies within a 30-ft.-radius burst, centered on the caster
spell.description: You gain an additional +1 on attack rolls or to AC due to battlefield positioning.

spell.name: Veil of Positive Energy
spell.effect: +2 AC, +2 on saves vs. undead.
spell.target: You or all creatures within 5 ft.; see text

source.source: Paizo Inc. - Advanced Player's Guide, p.254

spell.description: +2 AC, +2 on saves vs. undead.

spell.name: Virtue
spell.effect: With a touch, you infuse a creature with a tiny surge of life, granting the subject 1 temporary hit point.
spell.description: With a touch, you infuse a creature with a tiny surge of life, granting the subject 1 temporary hit point.

spell.name: Wartrain Mount
spell.effect: Animal gains combat training.
spell.description: Animal gains combat training.

spell.name: Word of Resolve
spell.effect: Ally rerolls a save against charm or fear.
spell.description: Ally rerolls a save against charm or fear.

spell.name: Detect Evil
spell.effect: You can sense the presence of evil.
spell.description: You can sense the presence of evil.

spell.name: Compel Hostility
spell.effect: Compels opponents to attack you instead of your allies.
spell.description: Compels opponents to attack you instead of your allies.

spell.name: Restoration (Lesser)
spell.effect: Lesser restoration dispels any magical effects reducing one of the subject's ability scores or cures 1d4 points of temporary ability damage to one of the subject's ability scores.
spell.description: Lesser restoration dispels any magical effects reducing one of the subject's ability scores or cures 1d4 points of temporary ability damage to one of the subject's ability scores.
